text: Soni achakongwe wajumu (ligongo lya uchekulu) awala wangakwembecheya kulombedwa, basi chipawe pangali ulemwa kukwao kuliunukula nguo syao (syapachanya) nambo mwangali kulosya ipeto (yankati mpela nkufu ibangili ni ine). Nambo naga ali atite aligose (ni kuleka kuliunukula nguo syao syapachanya) mpaka iwe yambone nnope kukwao. Sano Allah ni Jwakupikanichisya, Jwakumanyilila nnope
